title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Competency Enhancement Course Using Virtual Learning Objects for Nursing History

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three impacts of major historical events and figures in nursing on modern nursing practice.
Learners can analyze historical cases using virtual learning objects and apply them to project-based assessments.
Learners can propose nursing education content development plans by applying design principles based on the ADDIE model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
